attributes.action: To reduce the confusion facing motorists by placing speed limit repeater signs on streetlamps in 30MPH areas where there are streetlamps less than 200 yards or 183 metres apart
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 30mph speed limit is often broken simply because many motorists are unsure of what the speed limit is. In all other speed limit areas repeater signs are present. The 30 mph speed limit is usually in force in built-up and residential areas which have a greater number of hazards. Therefore speed limit reminders should be clearly posted in these areas.
